__e: I'm not as slim as I used to be.
So is Thin Man, as you well know.
That's an awful lot of blood for a skinny little shit like Frank.
Oh, of all the years to be trim and well-hatted.
Well, me and my left hand are going steady now. All newly fit and fabulous and no place to go, huh?
Of course, you'll still be you in a legal sense, but think of it as a thinner, more attractive, better you than you could ever become without us.
Excuse me, can you bring me low-fat milk, please? A couple of ice cubes.
Your profile said that you're tall and thin, with a good body and really big... hands.
